Altra 2021 Sustainability Report  /    INTEGRITY    /  37
MANAGEMENT OF THE LEGAL & REGULATORY ENVIRONMENT
Altra leverages multiple global teams 
to oversee and respond to a changing 
regulatory landscape. Altra’s corporate 
compliance, finance, and legal teams 
implement controls and procedures 
designed to minimize risk and support 
compliance globally.Our operations are subject to multiple laws 
and regulations, including those tied to 
environmental protection, import/export, 
and workplace health and safety. Our teams 
work closely to comply with export and 
import control and economic sanctions law, 
including but not limited to International 
Traffic in Arms Regulations and Export 
Administration Regulations. Further, 
our associates apply years of 
knowledge in the field to ensure 
compliance with federal,  
state, local and foreign 
environmental laws  
and regulations.Corporate Governance at Altra 
The Board of Directors sets high standards 
for the Company’s employees, officers, and 
directors. Implicit in this philosophy is the 
importance of sound corporate governance 
as the cornerstone of success. Our Board 
members are well-equipped with diverse 
viewpoints, backgrounds, and experiences.  
The Board currently has eight members, all  
of which except the Chairman and Chief 
Executive Officer, are independent. While 
we recognize that different board leadership 
structures may be appropriate for companies 
in different situations, we believe our current 
leadership structure best serves Altra. With  
Carl Christenson serving as Chairman and CEO and with independent Board leadership 
provided by the appointment of a Lead 
Director, we have created an optimal structure 
for Company governance.
The Board fulfills its responsibilities directly 
and through the Nominating and Corporate 
Governance Committee, the Compensation 
Committee, and the Audit Committee. 
Corporate Governance oversight is a shared 
responsibility across all three Committees.
To learn more, please refer to our Statement 
of Governance Principles, Committee Charters 
and Proxy Statement, which are all available  
on our Investor Relations website . Our associates apply years  
of knowledge in the field  
to ensure compliance with 
federal, state, local and 
foreign environmental laws  
and regulations.
